abstract: Diabetes drug developer Metabolex parlayed a strong partnership with Johnson & Johnson and promising early clinical data on its lead compound into a $32 million Series D round of venture capital from crossover investors, which could position the company for a public offering as soon as next year.
lead_paragraph: Diabetes drug developer Metabolex parlayed a strong partnership with Johnson & Johnson and promising early clinical data on its lead compound into a $32 million Series D round of venture capital from crossover investors, which could position the company for a public offering as soon as next year.
